item.title: Firebase Microservices With Cloud Run
item.description: Yesterday Google Cloud released a game-changing new product called Cloud Run that allows you to run and scale stateless Docker containers in a serverless execution environment powered by Knative. Benefits Run backend microservices with any programming language and/or dependencies. Serverless pricing, only pay for what you use. Scale automatically. Prevent cloud vendor lock-in. Some of the things you might do with it… Deploy server-rendered SSR frontend apps to Firebase Hosting, like Angular Universal, Nuxt, or Next.
